job_title:
AI Product Manager
AI Product Manager
posted_date: islamabad, islāmābād, pakistan · 1 week ago · 29 applicants no response insights available yet (2025-05-05)
job_description:
About the job
Job Description

Translation Empire PK is seeking an AI Product Manager to lead the planning, development, and deployment of AI-based products and features. You will bridge the gap between technical teams and business stakeholders, ensuring that AI solutions deliver tangible value.

Key Responsibilities:

Define product vision and strategy for AI initiatives
Collaborate with AI engineers and data scientists to shape development
Manage product roadmaps and prioritization
Gather requirements and convert them into actionable specifications
Monitor product performance and lead iterations based on feedback


Requirements


Qualification and Experience:

Bachelor's in Business, Computer Science, or a related field; MBA preferred
3+ years of experience in product management, preferably in AI or tech
Strong understanding of AI concepts and development life cycles
Excellent stakeholder communication and project leadership skills


Certification:

Product management or AI-related certifications are an advantage.

Work mode:

Work from Office.

Location:

DHA 1 Sector F Rwp.

Salary:

Market Competitive.
